ElementDescription: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject
Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project
Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY
Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging.
Notes: Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.
M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported

ElementDescription: How much of would your close friends approve if you: Abstained from marijuana
Notes: 1= Disapproving of regular use; 2= Not caring about abstinence or use; 3= Disapproving of abstinence but not caring about or not approving of use; 4= Approving of using once or twice but not more; 5= Approving of moderate but not regular use; 6= Approving of regular use

ElementDescription: How much of would your close friends approve if you: Tried marijuana once or twice
Notes: 1= Disapproving of regular use; 2= Not caring about abstinence or use; 3= Disapproving of abstinence but not caring about or not approving of use; 4= Approving of using once or twice but not more; 5= Approving of moderate but not regular use; 6= Approving of regular use

ElementDescription: How much of would your close friends approve if you: Smoked marijuana occasionally
Notes: 1= Disapproving of regular use; 2= Not caring about abstinence or use; 3= Disapproving of abstinence but not caring about or not approving of use; 4= Approving of using once or twice but not more; 5= Approving of moderate but not regular use; 6= Approving of regular use

ElementDescription: How much of would your close friends approve if you: Smoked marijuana regularly
Notes: 1= Disapproving of regular use; 2= Not caring about abstinence or use; 3= Disapproving of abstinence but not caring about or not approving of use; 4= Approving of using once or twice but not more; 5= Approving of moderate but not regular use; 6= Approving of regular use

ElementDescription: How often do you think your friends typically use marijuana?
Notes: 0= Never; 1= Once per year; 2= 6 times per year; 3= Once per month; 4= Twice per month; 5= Once per week; 5= 3-5 times per week; 7= 5 times per year; 8= Every day
